sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT R.PERIOD_START,R.PERIOD_END,R.SNAP_DATE,R.BATCH_NBR,PIPELINE_NAME  FROM DWH.PIPELINE_INFO P, DWH.PIPELINE_RUNS R  WHERE P.PIPELINE_ID = R.PIPELINE_ID AND R.PIPELINE_RUN_STATUS = '1' AND P.PIPELINE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_PIPELINE_NAME}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcNTF
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
source(output(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM1
SrcNTF select(mapColumn(
		FIRM_ID = FirmID,
		ENTITY_NAME = A04,
		ADDRESS = A06,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumn
SelectColumn aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_NAME),
	each(match(name!='ENTITY_NAME'), $$ = last($$))) ~> DistinctByAggregate
DistinctByAggregate derive(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ADDRESS,
FIRM_ID
)) ~> SourceRecordHash
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		EXIST_ENTITY_ID = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID,
		EXIST_VERSION_NO = ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO,
		EXIST_ENTITY_NAME = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_NAME,
		EXIST_ADDRESS = ADDRESS,
		EXIST_FIRM_ID = FIRM_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExistingCol
SelectExistingCol derive(RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
EXIST_ADDRESS,
EXIST_FIRM_ID
)) ~> ExstingRecordHash
SourceRecordHash, ExstingRecordHash exists(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH == RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, ExstingRecordHash lookup(ENTITY_NAME == EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXIST_ENTITY_ID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecord)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord derive(VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecord derive(VERSION_NO = EXIST_VERSION_NO +1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
RunInfo2 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2
ExistingDIM1 aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_ID,
		ENTITY_NAME),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestEntityID
ExistingDIM, LatestEntityID join(ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID == LatestEntityID@ENTITY_ID
	&& ExistingDIM@ENTITY_NAME == LatestEntityID@ENTITY_NAME
	&& ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO == LatestEntityID@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		FIRM_ID,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMENTITY
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		ENTITY_SR_KEY as integer,
		ENTITY_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		ENTITY_NAME as string,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		WEBSITE as string,
		TWITTER as string,
		LINKEDIN as string,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		POBOX as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY as string,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE as string,
		MAILING_POST_CODE as string,
		MAILING_COUNTRY as string,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN as string,
		FIRM_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = EXIST_ENTITY_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ADDRESS,
		FIRM_ID,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdDIMENTITY

parameters{
	P_DWH_MART_STAGE_FILE as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcDATALAKE
SrcDATALAKE sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		{Date of birth2} as string,
		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Region as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Title as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		Location as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		{Account Name} as string,
		{English Name} as string,
		Acronym as string,
		{Account Type} as string,
		{Account Sub-Type} as string,
		{Office Address: Country} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Parent Account} as string,
		Confidential as string,
		Activity as string,
		Product as string,
		{Women Managed} as string,
		{Youth Managed} as string,
		{Social media} as string,
		{Other emails} as string,
		{Other phone numbers} as string,
		{Other information} as string,
		{Ownership and management} as string,
		{Trade Forum} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Office Address: City} as string,
		{Office Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing address is equal to office address} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Mailing Address: City} as string,
		{Mailing Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Country} as string,
		{UN Mailing Format} as string,
		{Project Number} as string,
		Salutation as string,
		Account as string,
		Phone as string,
		{Preferred Language} as string,
		{Use account address} as string,
		{Event title} as string,
		{Event type} as string,
		{Course name} as string,
		{Start date} as string,
		{End date} as string,
		{Event date} as string,
		{SME Trade Academy} as string,
		SheTrades as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[($P_DWH_MART_STAGE_FILE)],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> trgMARTSTAGE

schema.name: Please select the area of your activity
Mailing address is equal to office address
